description:
Hata Ranko is the head of the school`s newspaper club, she likes to take photos of the student council members to sell around the school, usually without the permission of those being photographed, although she often gets caught with her antics. When she conducts an interview, she likes to twist the responses to something dirty or perverted, with Tsuda as her frequent target. She is expressionless, and has a deadpan monotone voice in the anime, which strongly contrasts with the other girls` excitable temperaments.
Source: Wiki
name: Hata Ranko
